data.text: @GovNedLamont @POTUS How can you thank POTUS who has a 37% approval rating, rampant historical inflation, an Opioid epidemic, an open southern border and the CT population continues to decline ? - here's a clue run away from POTUS. enact pro growth policies combined with fiscal discipline ASAP
@RampagePatriot @GovNedLamont @POTUS Like the one trump bragged about taking after his stroke?

@GovNedLamont @DemGovs @POTUS The American Rescue Plan provided $1,400 relief checks, more child tax credits, support for small businesses, and other assistance, all helping the economy soar.

No Republicans voted for this.

#DemocratsDeliver, and they're #BuildingABetterAmerica.

https://t.co/ZSdUP3FBGf

@GovNedLamont @POTUS Let’s first get an accounting of this money before you take a victory lap. Furthermore, @POTUS and CT delegation oversaw the biggest inflation jump in 40 yrs, putting most of us in negative wage growth territory.  #Elections2022
@tr_resident @GovNedLamont @POTUS Right after Brandon takes a cognitive test...
@Packratmom @GovNedLamont @POTUS If he’s going to take credit for something he should take blame as well. I know why some didn’t get it…they’re white males that own them
@GovNedLamont @POTUS Lol!!!!! Hahaha, stop…..hahaha….ow my sides hurt….lol…
